title: White-Hall fayre, or, Who buys good penniworths of Barkstead the fayre proclamed.
author: Barkstead, John, d. 1662.
notes: Attributed to Barkstead by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: print show-through, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
